item.description:
Conserving a 600-Year-Old Altarpiece
Join world-class art conservators Lance Mayer and Gay Myers, as well as curator Kurt Sundstrom for a discussion about the conservation treatment of the new painted altarpiece, on view in the European gallery.Then watch several Oscar-winning film shorts offered by Red River Theatre and learn about their upcoming film schedule.

http://www.currier.org/eventsprograms.aspx#first_thursdays_live

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Currier Museum First Thursdays
